profile:
COSMOPOLITAN CONSTRUCTION INC.
WINNER OF THE "BEST OF" HOMESTARS AWARDS 7 YEARS IN A ROW, AND COUNTING!

We specialize in EIFS Stucco & Cement Stucco, Interior & Exterior Renovations, Moulding, Repairing cracks, etc. 

Our focus is on providing you with stucco siding for a new home or a new addition, as well as replacing your house's existing siding. 

Whether your home's current siding is Plywood, Wood, Stucco, Brick, Metal, Wood Shingle or Vinyl -- we have you covered! 
And if you do not know what your siding's currently made of, we will visit your home and assess it ourselves.

It does not matter whether your home is one story, two stories or more!

We handle installing or completely replacing exterior trim, as well as repairing or partially replacing exterior trim. If there is evidence of water damage or rot on your existing trim, we will work on solving the issue!

Even if your exterior trim is made of Wood, Vinyl, Aluminum Wrap or Fiber Cement, we will take care of it. 

Our time is flexible and we will begin work on your project as soon as possible. We look forward to your newly stuccoed home or business just as much as you!

For more information or to book a FREE estimate, please CALL, TEXT, or EMAIL US:
(C) 905-399-5851
cosmo-construction@hotmail.com

_________________________________________________________

Information on STUCCO (EIFS): 

The EIFS Stucco process refers to the Exterior Insulation Finishing System, and it involves the following process:
- Application of a moisture barrier onto plywood
- Installation of Styrofoam (typically 1.5")
- Application of a base coat with fibreglass mesh onto the Styrofoam
- Application of a finish coat (colour and texture of your choice)

This same process is used for installing mouldings onto the outside of a house - which is usually applied around windows and doors. 

There is no maintenance requirement on the product once we are finished. It does not need to be resealed or painted. It remains intact and unchanged from its original look.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
SGM Contracting has been in business for over 50 years. Consistent with the vision and values of our founder, we strive to provide innovative techniques to Commercial & Residential EIFS/Stucco and Masonry projects.  We’ve been blessed to create lasting relationships with some of Canada’s most notable brands. SGM Contracting is proud of our “Coast-to-Coast” reputation for excellence! 

Today, SGM Contracting is bringing all of your exterior designs and dreams to life from wall to ground, serving the Greater Toronto Area and Surrounding Areas. Contact us today and we’ll have one of our representatives take you through the process of having your contracting needs met, step-by-step.

Covid 19 Update: We are following all the health and safety guidelines as directed by the Province of Ontario to ensure the safety of our customers and employees. We are open to phone appointments, onsite appointments and ZOOM appointments or FaceTime if you prefer.
name: SGM Contracting

profile: HK Stucco Inc. is the leading installer of exterior stucco, stucco repair, mouldings, parging, EIFS in Toronto, the GTA and Ontario. Our professional approach to each project ensures that we deliver quality service to our customers at that right price. No job is too small for us. If you have a small or large scale project that needs to be completed on-time, on-budget and to perfection or you are planning a renovation to the interior or exterior of your home or business, HK Stucco Inc. will put all the effort to make your wish come true. We specialize in the installationof the all types of high quality stucco systems. We have the knowledge and expertise to work with you and discuss the perfect solution for your next project.
